articles.description: CURRYS has taken the wraps off more Black Friday 2020 discounts. And it includes some of the best savings yet - and best of all, Currys will refund the difference if the price drops again between today and Black Friday itself, which lands on Friday November 2…

articles.title: The new £180,000 Nissan GT-R Nismo has upped the ante - but can it compete with a Porsche? - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Nissan's latest motor rivals the industry's top super-speed performance cars
articles.content: You might think Nissan only sells sensible cars built for families on a tight budget. However, delve deeper into the current range and one model bucks the trend big time - outstripping many supercars… [+862 chars]
